text: hello this is chef john from food wishes
comm with how to make tomato rose and
not just any tomato rose a cherry tomato
rose so beautiful so sweet
perfect for showing your feminine side
which i do occasionally to accomplish
this simple get amazing feat of
vegetable sorcery we're going to take a
large red cherry tomato and i'm gonna
cut into the bottom alright i'm gonna
find the bottom and i'm gonna cut in
right there about two-thirds of the way
don't go too far and after I cut in
two-thirds away I'm gonna turn it like
that and simply mimic peeling an orange
or an apple or the spherical fruit of
your choice so I'm simply gonna go round
I'm gonna try to keep it about the same
width as I can the farther I go the more
sort of petals my Rose will have but you
don't have to go like crazy like I'm
doing because what I'm really doing here
is trying to cut my thumb which I didn't
accomplish I'm happy to report once you
have that cut off simply roll it up from
the thin end back towards the base kind
of smoosh it together with your fingers
until it looks like it rose and I know
what you're thinking what purpose does
this serve absolutely none zero no
purpose it just looks kind of pretty but
if you make your significant other a
salad and put this on the side they will
be all like tomato rose you're awesome I
love you alright or something to that
